Tempo: 70 bpm

Economy of motion!

## Picking Practice

-   Alternate picking, fingers 4-2-3-1, from E to e string, 25 repetitions

-   Alternate picking, 2x each time, fingers 1-2-3-4, from E to e string, 25 repetitions

-   Alternate picking, fingers 1-3-2-4, from E to e string, 25 repetitions

## Chromatic Scale

## Cmaj Scale

-   Play Cmaj scale up & down, 1 min

## Chord Practice

-   **G** Chord, 25 repetitions

-   **Cadd9** Chord, 25 repetitions

-   **Dsus4** Chord, 25 repetitions

-   Chord progression, **G → Cadd9 → Dsus4**, 3 min.
